results.title: Silent diabetes mellitus, periodontitis and a new case of thalamic abscess.
results.text_hl: Radiological resolution of the @<m>DISEASE_Thalamic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013786 @@@thalamic abscess@@@ occurred within 2 months.
